questions.question: What is the chemical formula for Zn(AIm)2?
Which ZIF material has the highest calculated band gap according to Table S3?
What is the ignition delay (ID) for Zn(AIm)2 when using WFNA as an oxidizer?
Based on the synthesis conditions, which ZIF material is expected to have the highest BET surface area?
True or False: ZIF-8 exhibits hypergolic behavior when tested with WFNA.
What is the role of ammonium acetate in the mechanochemical synthesis of ZIFs?
questions.answer: It acts as a catalytic salt.

questions.question: True or False: The hypergolicity of ZIFs is influenced by the choice of metal and linker components.
Which ZIF material retained its hypergolic activity after 1 month of storage when tested with WFNA?
True or False: The formation of coordination bonds in a ZIF improves hypergolic behavior compared to the free ligand.
What is the ignition delay (ID) for Co(AIm)2 when using RFNA as an oxidizer?
True or False: The vinyl-substituted MOFs were not hypergolic with RFNA.
What is the calculated band gap for Zn(VIm)2?
True or False: The ability to include the oxidizer in the MOF is critical for hypergolic response.
Which ZIF material has the lowest calculated band gap, indicating potentially higher reactivity?
True or False: The hypergolic MOFs are expected to be non-microporous.
What is the role of ethanol in the mechanochemical synthesis of ZIFs?
questions.answer: It acts as a milling liquid.

questions.question: True or False: The ignition delay (ID) for ZIF materials is not affected by the method of preparation.
Which ZIF material showed the shortest ignition delay (ID) with WFNA?
True or False: All ZIF materials studied exhibit hypergolic behavior with both WFNA and RFNA.
What is the significance of the calculated band gaps in relation to the hypergolic properties of ZIFs?
questions.answer: Lower calculated band gaps are related to higher hypergolic reactivity.
